attributes.action: promise not to waste parliamentary time discussing an amnesty for illegal immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is currently a campaign to grant amnesty to illegal immigrants who have been in this country for four or more years. The granting of such an amnesty would be unworkable (How do you know how long an illegal immigrant has been in the country) and would serve as a reward for flouting the immigration laws. This notion should not be entertained.
